fields.name: Coogam Metal Wire Puzzle Set of 16
fields.description:
Metal puzzle brain teaser condenses with traditional Chinese culture and they are quite interesting to creative thinking and improve both your IQ and EQ.
Metal Wire Puzzle set suitable for kids and adults

fields.name: 3D Wooden Cube
fields.description: This wooden 3D brain teaser puzzle toy originated from ancient China, which has been called "Kong Ming Lock". Suitable for all ages

fields.name: Russian Blocks Puzzle
fields.description: The Wooden Puzzle set has one set of 40 Pcs Russian blocks puzzles and one set of 16 Pcs hexagon puzzles. Premium wooden toy made of natural healthy basswood with smooth surface and non-toxic paint.

fields.name: Fidget Toy: Rotate & Slide Puzzle
fields.description: Not only a logic toy,but also a rotating slide puzzle.It is a combination of magic cube and puzzle,its puzzle pieces can be rotated from left and right around the axis as well as be slided up and down.You can create different patterns, or restore the puzzle pieces that are out of order to the original state layer by layer

fields.name: Kanoodle Genius Puzzle
fields.description: 2-D & 3-D BRAIN-TWISTING PUZZLES: Kanoodle Genius is a puzzle game that includes 7 puzzle pieces, 202 advanced puzzle challenges, an 84-page puzzle book, and a carrying case. Makes a great activity for kids to stay engaged, entertained, and learning.

fields.name: Memory Run - Electronic Memory Handheld Game with Lights
fields.description: CLASSIC GAMEPLAY: Watch attentively, remember, and repeat! The electronic handheld game presents an exciting challenge to track, and repeat the patterns and advance to higher levels.

fields.name: Roto Brain 3D Puzzle Sphere
fields.description:
Three levels of challenges with thousands of combination possibilities. Patent pending technology to have a never ending puzzle with ability to reset each level's combination.
IQ/Memory booster that is challenging and fun.

fields.name: Rotating Magic Cube Puzzle
fields.description: Not only a logic toy,but also a rotating slide puzzle.It is a combination of magic cube and puzzle,its puzzle pieces can be rotated from left and right around the axis as well as be slided up and down.

fields.name: 3D Cube Metal Puzzle
fields.description: Comprised of eight pieces of brass and stainless steel and the components can be assembled together and form a slightly rounded cube with a beautiful two-color appearance. Rated as level 7 difficulty

fields.name: 3D Interlocking Puzzle Game
fields.description: Chic design: This brain teaser game is a challenging activity, which can bring you a sense of accomplishment when you succeed. Reduce stress and letting you concentrate on solving puzzles and enjoy the fun.

fields.name: GiiKER Super Slide Brain Game
fields.description: Innovative and Interactive: Super Slide is an interactive game console for sliding jigsaw puzzles. Follow the LED to set a game, the goal is to shift the big square block to the automatic detection zone.

fields.name: 5-Piece Magic Cube
fields.description: Different levels of Magic Cube can increase your challenge level from simple to difficult, allowing you to enjoy the fun of different levels of difficulty. Large rounded corners and non-sticky design.

fields.name: Metal and Wood Brain Teaser (22 Set)
fields.description: Metal and Wood Brain Teaser for Kids and Adults . All the coils and blocks are smooth and have NO SHARP EDGES for endless play without getting hurt. The links are made from high quality steel as well as lightweight and durable beech wood that doesn't easily bend or break even when thrown or stepped on. Players can't force them open so there is no chance of cheating.

fields.name: 4 Pack Magic Rainbow Ball Puzzle
fields.description: Scratch the colored balls and figure out how to get them back into the matching holes. Whether at home or school, it is suitable for keeping everyone busy.

fields.name: IQ Metal lock puzzle
fields.description: Perfect for passing time, fidgeting, and avoiding gadgets and electronics. Theyâ€™re a healthier way to practice focus and concentration. Test logic and creative minds with this cool yet simple brain teaser.

fields.name: Dragon 3D Metal Puzzle Model Kit
fields.description: 3D metal model kit. It may take more than 7 hours to complete, depending on your speed and patience. After hours dedicated working and completed your own amazing handcraft, you will get a strong sense of accomplishment and stress relief.

fields.name: 6 Piece Brain Teaser (Metal and Wooden Puzzles)
fields.description: The package comes with a set of wooden and metal puzzle toys, including wooden hexagonal puzzle, wooden magic ball puzzle, wooden plum puzzle. These puzzles can challenge your brain and patience, and help develop intelligence and imagination.

fields.name: 24 Piece Mini Puzzle Boxes
fields.description: Balance IQ maze games with different types of small game boxes. Share with your family and friends, and entertain yourself in your spare time. There are different level, such as simple, medium difficulty, and higher difficulty, which can inspire and train the way of thinking and hands-on ability.

fields.name: 5pcs Wooden Puzzles
fields.description: The puzzles are made of wooden concave and convex blocks which mesh perfectly. Training your logical reasoning ability and space imagination ability. Difficulty level 3

fields.name: Secret Puzzle Box with Hidden Compartments
fields.description: Puzzle box with hidden compartments will challenge your mind, requires the correct sequence of moves to open. Can be used for surprise money gift boxes, gift cards, and jewelry holder.

fields.name: Classic Tangram (3 Difficulty Levels)
fields.description: 60 puzzle patterns in this game. Learning While Playing. Exercise your logical ability and spatial thinking, stimulate your imagination and creativity.

fields.name: 3D Metal Asian Puzzle
fields.description: Thrill the entire family and provide fun and entertainment piecing this DIY metal puzzle model kit together. Building this 3-D Puzzle model Kit can be worthy for the family to complete together.The complexity of this kit will bring families together for hours to create something truly unique to display in their home.

fields.name: The Cool Traveling Robot (3D Metal Model)
fields.description: Exercise both sides of brain, reduce stress and increase positive energy, which is wonderful learning toys for teens and the 3D metal models looks very charming when it is finished.

fields.name: 3D Interactive Maze ball
fields.description: A wonderful space training, imagination educational toy. This maze ball labyrinth globe is good for children to control balance, improve intellect and learn to build up patience.

fields.name: Mind Bender Puzzles (set of 3)
fields.description: Hanayama cast puzzles are some of the world's finest brain teasers. These high-quality, cast metal puzzles come in six challenging, Mensa-rated levels of difficulty.

fields.name: Color Money Maze Puzzle Boxes
fields.description: Adorable and novel gift maze puzzle box: give the reward in a hard way instead of just putting cash in an envelope, let people to get the reward with their effort, teach them the words "no pains, no gains", also develop their logic and imagination.

fields.name: Cast Metal Brain Teaser
fields.description: Small, compact, beautifully designed brain teaser puzzle. Sharpen your skills at taking things apart and putting them back together. Level 6 difficulty.

fields.name: Rainbow magnetic fidget
fields.description: Magnesis is proud to present to you their newest favourite 6 in 1 fidget companion. Over 200 magnetic dots to assemble into many patterns. Great for mindfulness practice, meditation, stress relief and finger dexterity. With you at your desk or watching tv, your set will always be there for a fun & relaxing break.

fields.name: Brain Break Conversation Cards
fields.description: The goal of Brain Break Conversation Cards is to build healthy relationships between young people and mentors and help establish a vocabulary for talking about emotions and sensations in a healthy way. These cards are perfect for classrooms, therapists offices, counselor's offices, or the kitchen table!

fields.name: Thor hammer Interlocking Puzzle
fields.description:
Hammer of Thor interlocking cube puzzle inspired by Viking's mythology.
Perfect gift for puzzlers / Vikings lovers. It consists of 15 different parts.
Take apart the shape and put it back together. Nice challenge for both adults and teens.

fields.name: Interlocking Burr puzzle
fields.description: While serving as an appealing decoration this puzzle is satisfying to work with. The puzzle is made of 6 identical parts. Perfect gift for puzzles lovers. Take apart the shape and put it back together.

fields.name: IQ Puzzle: Brain Fitness
fields.description: Challenge your brain to make the special designs shown on the cards. The puzzle is extremely fun to collect and once people start collecting it, they just can't stop. It improves the way you think with really challenging designs which can take more than an hour to complete.

fields.name: Pyramid puzzle box
fields.description: The Quest Pyramid is an interactive pyramid with various puzzles that need to be solved one by one in order to open the pyramid. In other words, an escape room in the palms of your hands! Not one step is at all random â€“ itâ€™s all based on logical decisions.

fields.name: Wooden Tower of Hanoi
fields.description: Not just a fun brain puzzle but also an amazing desktop conversation piece. Can you solve this ancient puzzle? Move all the wooden rings from one pole to anotherâ€”but wait! You cannot put a larger ring on top of a smaller one! It's possible, but it's takes some time, patience, and smarts!

fields.name: MagicSquare 64
fields.description: In recreational mathematics, a magic square is an arrangement of integers in a square grid where each number is used only once. Can you arrange the blocks such that every row, column and main diagonals add to the same number?

fields.name: The Line up
fields.description:
This game requires strong nerves and steady hands! You tilt this hand held game to bring the balls safely to their targets. But beware: The many traps make the way difficult!
Who's got the skill to get the bead to the end goals? This is a great game of skill for all patient people, young and old!

fields.name: Forced Route
fields.description: Who's got the skill to get the bead to the end goals? But beware: The many traps make the way difficult! How to play: The beads have to roll according to the specifc route of numbers from 1-16.

fields.name: The Impossible Puzzle
fields.description: Do you like puzzles? Like a challenge? Do you know a puzzle enthusiast or someone who enjoys a brain bender!? Welcome to THE IMPOSSIBLE PUZZLE! A unique, one of a kind, jigsaw puzzle. Assembled it makes no picture. Pieces can face any way. You'll think you're on the right track but only one configuration is correct!

fields.name: Revolving Century II
fields.description: Can your rotate the rings to get all 6 columns to add to 100 at the same time? Only 1 solution, but 5700 possible permutations of the wheel. This premium version of the puzzle use both Maple and Alder wood. The base and 'cap' of this version are made from Maple with the other rings being Alder.

fields.name: Trisected Spiral Cube Puzzle
fields.description:
This beautifully crafted, intricate puzzle cube is made of 3 identical parts. The aim is to take it apart and then assemble it again.
Perfect gift for puzzles lovers

fields.name: Japanese Diamond Puzzle
fields.description:
This beautiful unique construction diamond shape puzzle made of 12 nonidentical wooden pieces that fit together perfectly to lock into place and hold the diamond shape together. The Diamond Puzzle has one key piece which must be removed first to unlock the puzzle, and be placed last to lock the puzzle back into itsâ€™ original shape.
Once youâ€™ve solved the Diamond Puzzle, it makes a beautiful art piece to display on a bookshelf or coffee table!

fields.name: Puzzle Lock
fields.description: The Lock 64 is a very difficult puzzle that doesn't require a key to open it (only mind and hends). Once you figure out the right sequence of steps, you will be able to open the lock.

fields.name: Rubiks Cube
fields.description: The original brain teaser!  Great brain teaser for the kids and a stress reliever for the adults after a long day. Promotes problem solving skills, eye-hand coordination, and cognitive thinking.

fields.name: Stumped
fields.description: If you love a good puzzle or love to challenge your cranium then this pocket sized Stumped Puzzle with 24 challenges is the real brain teasing puzzle for you!

fields.name: Mega Large Print Word Search Book
fields.description:
A4 Mega Large Print Word Search book. 225 Puzzles In Medium Print.
Perfect For Adults & Children. These Come In 2 Designs, You Will Be Sent One At Random (If More Than One Is Purchased, We will always try to send an assortment of designs).

fields.name: IQ Puzzle
fields.description:
Multiple levels of brain-teasing fun!  
Smart-games new IQ-Games Pro features. 120 challenges playing in 3D Pieces in a 2D game board! Improve your Concentration, Problem Solving, Spatial Insight by challenging your brain! All in the same compact, portable travel case.

fields.name: Wooden Geometric Logic game
fields.description: Sharpen those fertile minds with a game that teaches kids 3 things in one fun swoop! This game involves colour recognition, shape recognition, and stacking skills. Every set comes with 16 sets of frames, 1 bell, 54 game cards, and instructions; enough to fuel hours of fun for up to 3 adorable players.

fields.name: Genius Science Book Myths Debunked
fields.description:
Fun book debunking science myths.
Prepare to have your beliefs shattered!

fields.name: The Shape Shifting Box
fields.description: Powered by 36 rare earth magnets. Can you master the shape shifting box? COLLECT & CONNECT multiple Shashibo's to build larger structures. With its strong internal magnet system you can combine numerous cubes to build even larger shapes, sculptures and structures. Can you create them all?

fields.name: Coggy brainteaser
fields.description: Get your mental gears spinning with this bending, clicking, shape-shifting brainteaser! Moving from one challenge card to the next, it's up to you to fold this connected collection of sixteen colorful gears into the perfect positions that match each image. It's not long before your synapses are in a jam and you're forced to shift to a higher gear of thinking!

fields.name: Gravity Maze Marble Logic
fields.description: Falling marble logic game. Build a path through the towers to get the marble to the target!

fields.name: Rubix 360 Degrees Sphere Ball
fields.description: Tilt and turn the Rubiks 360 and guide each ball into the matching colored dome. Its harder than it looks!

fields.name: Light Speed 3D maze
fields.description: COLORFUL 3D MAZE: Maneuver the ball through endless twists and turns to reach the purple, green, blue or yellow goals surrounding the central orb. Can you navigate your ball to the next color goal without falling off the twisty track? Follow the colorful light commands to test your skills.

fields.name: Rebel 3D Gravity Maze Game
fields.description: Can you make it through the 70 obstacles? Move the ball along the numbered track through tricky hurdles like the igloo, terrible tube and scary stairs without falling off the track!

fields.name: Wooden Kongming Lock
fields.description: Easy to take apart and difficult to reassemble. Challenge your mind and test your skills

fields.name: Megaminx Magic Cube
fields.description: A different spin on the classic rubix cube. Test your skill with this modern version!

fields.name: Metal Horseshoe Puzzle
fields.description: Puzzle yourself or others and test your IQ with this brain teaser. Made from solid Nordic Forge cast iron with the attached metal chain. See if you can release the metal piece or if the joke's on you.

fields.name: Gravity Memory Sequential Maze Plate Puzzle
fields.description: New styles puzzle ball game, no loneliness, more interesting all the time. No need to set-up, clean-up or install batteries. Easy to play, hard to master! Allow your kids to experience some real hands-on fun. Develops motor skills, concentration, perception and most of all patience!

fields.name: Chinese key
fields.description: Different shapes lock for you to select. Ability training: emotion, vision, intellectual development, crawling, manual brain, grasping, sensory, hand-eye coordination and interaction.

fields.name: Fidget Snake
fields.description: The magic ruler is an ingenious structure and simple operation. It is a freely curved and rotating modeling toy. As a traditional educational toy, it stimulates children's creativity and observation of three-dimensional modeling.

fields.name: Sudoku Page-A-Day Calendar 2022
fields.description: Every puzzle in the Sudoku Page-a-Day Calendar is crafted by a human, so putting pencil to paper is like going one-on-one against a Sudoku master for a challenge that balances toughness with an elegant solvability, giving you a real sense of satisfaction when you find the solution.

fields.name: Chunky Puzzles - Mini Wooden Barrel
fields.description: The Barrel is part of the Chunky Puzzles range by Professor Puzzle. This wooden range are all boxed in 5cm x 5cm boxes so are perfect for taking with you on a journey or travelling. You need to take apart the barrel for the first challenge. If you manage this you then simply need to put it back together again!

fields.name: Word Search Puzzle Book
fields.description: This word search book contains large print word search puzzles, cleverly hidden word searches, suitable for all levels. Brain-boosting entertainment for adults with solutions.

fields.name: Trivial Pursuit Ultimate Puzzle Book
fields.description: More than 160 puzzles based on more than 1500 official Trivial Pursuit questions. Includes word searches, crossword puzzles and jumbles plus bonus trivia questions.

fields.name: Word Scramble Puzzle Book
fields.description:
This word scramble puzzles consist of words or phrases in the interests and knowledge base of everyone's where the letters have been scrambled.
Solve each puzzle by rearranging the letters to form the word or phrase.
A separate section provides the solution so that you can check your answer.

fields.name: Hidden Pictures: Farm Puzzles
fields.description:
Kids will have hours of fun on the farm with this collection of black-and-white hidden picturess puzzles! 
Packed with more than 100 favorite farm-themed puzzles and over 1,200 objects to find, this book provides kids of all ages with plenty of puzzling fun while honing their concentration skills and attention to detail.

fields.name: Wooden Rope Loop Puzzle
fields.description: Classical intelligence puzzle toy. Perfect for IQ development and imagination. The lock may look simple, but it contains lots of mysteries. Challenge your mind and patience.

fields.name: Code breaks
fields.description:
A4 Jumbo Puzzle Book. 
These come in 2 designs, you will be sent one at random (If more than one is purchased, we will send an assortment of designs).

fields.name: Ultimate Brain Health Puzzle Ultimate Brain Health Puzzle Book
fields.description:
Exercise your mind with the ultimate collection of brain games.
Keeping your brain healthy is just as important as taking care of your body. While all puzzles are great for brain health, different kinds of puzzles strengthen different mental skills

fields.name: The Mind
fields.description: Nominated for Game of the Year 2018. THE MIND is more than just a game. It's an experiment, a journey, simply and the most ingenious team experience you can have.

fields.name: The Master Theorem
fields.description: Dubbed "Mensa's evil twin" by The New York Times, The Master Theorem originated in 2011 as an online "secret society of solvers" and quickly developed a cult following. Its larger-than-life figurehead was the cryptic polymath known only as M who posted mysterious puzzles, called Theorems, each week at midnight.
